DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether combining noninvasive brain stimulation with cognitive training can reduce craving in adults with tobacco use disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Combining Noninvasive Brain Stimulation and Cognitive Training on Tobacco Craving
DOC.criteria: 2060 years old Smoking > 15 cigarettes per day Tobacco Use Disorder according to Diagnostic and Statistical Manual V criteria Contraindications to noninvasive brain stimulation Psychiatric or neurologic condition
